text: Graham Brazier (6 May 1952 - 4 September 2015) was a New Zealand musician and songwriter. He was best known as a member of the band Hello Sailor. He was also a member of The Pink Flamingos and The Legionnaires. He was born in Auckland. Brazier died from a heart attack on 4 September 2015 in Auckland, aged 63. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Musicians from Auckland Category:Pop musicians Category:Rock musicians Category:Songwriters
title: Graham Brazier
